EmailTemplate.name: RCMP-EN.EM-1-RCMP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy + RCMP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I’m Julie Hayter, your dedicated Grand & Toy account representative. We’ve been serving the Canadian Government for decades, providing workplace innovation products that enable you and your team to be your productive best. We also hold multiple Standing Offers and Supply Arrangements across various product categories.
We’ve set up a customized landing page for our RCMP customers. Check it out now to see:
- PSPC approved Standing Offer products. - Tips and tricks to make procurement easier. - Custom links to provide direct access to account specialists, budget monitoring and recurring order programs.
Your department deserves the best and we are here to help.
Let’s get started! <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/RCMP.html?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
P.S. If this email is not applicable to your role, can you please forward it to the appropriate person in your department?
Best,
Julie Hayter Government Account Manager | Directeur De Comptes
900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: juliehayter@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:juliehayter@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 613-851-4630 E-mail: FederalServices@grandandtoy.com | Tel: 866-511-4534 | Fax: 877-214-3958 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov/?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
